## Shiny features

-   Dashboard layout

-   Radio buttons

-   Text input

-   Date input

-   Action buttons (enable/disable)

-   Tabs

-   RHandsontable

-   Leaflet Map

-   Download PDF

[App.R]{.underline}: dashboard

-   [global_libraries.R]{.underline}

-   [app.R]{.underline} files individual app run file

    -   [server.R files]{.underline}: nuts and bolts

        -   [Rmd files]{.underline}: rmarkdown file rendered from the server file
